body.name: PURA D'OR Advanced Therapy Conditioner (16oz) For Increased Moisture, Strength, Volume & Texture, No Sulfates, Made with Argan Oil & Biotin, All Hair Types, Men & Women (Packaging May Vary)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 48 mins
features: MOISTURIZING RELIEF: dry scalp can make your hair look dull. Give your scalp The fresh relief It needs from itchiness and dryness. Our hair conditioner is made with a proprietary blend of select botanical ingredients to provide smoothing hydration to the hair and scalp.

REJUVENATION: ensure that your hair and scalp gets the nourishment it needs to regain the lost bounce and texture. Our strengthening conditioner with plant-based active ingredients stimulate weak follicles. This clarifying stimulation has become possible through years of research and development in this proprietary superior formula.
BOOST HAIR TEXTURE AND VOLUME: using our hair thickening Conditioner, give your scalp The healthy environment It deserves to encourage fuller, thicker looking hair.
SOFTER, SHINIER, STRONGER HAIR: Designed to improve texture and volume and help revive damaged hair. Helps to build stronger, tangle-free hair with added luster and shine.
SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: healthy hair, happy customers. We offer SATISFACTION guarantee. If you are unsatisfied with our conditioner, let us know and we will give you a full refund
body.description: Aging, environmental stressors, and genetics can all cause major hair issues. While it is inevitable for some, Pura d’or advanced Therapy Conditioner can still help you reduce these issues. Our gentle mild formula is enriched with our proprietary blend of key active ingredients and hand-selected botanical ingredients. The key active ingredients Clean your scalp from sources of thinning hair and stimulate circulation within the scalp and unclog blocked follicles. Cucumber extract, rosemary and avocado oils assist in the hair rejuvenation process and improve appearance, volume, and texture. Natural ingredients like Argan Oil, Aloe Vera, and rice Bran extract lock in moisture by providing hair with the vitamins It needs. Use this conditioner each time after you wash your hair with pure d’or shampoo to soothe itch and promote thicker, healthier looking hair. Our advanced thinning hair conditioner works in synergy with our advanced Therapy Shampoo for a faster, quicker results. For use with all hair types, natural, curly, color or chemically treated hair. Enjoyed by both men and women. All pure d’or products are free from paraben, sulfates, and artificial additives. We are cruelty free, vegan, hypoallergenic, and manufactured in Southern California with a renewable solar energy source. Give your hair the nourishment and volume its been longing with pure d’or advanced Therapy Conditioner.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About PURA D'OR PURA D’OR is driven by the desire to provide superior solutions to your toughest beauty and personal care problems. Experience nature and purity in every formula with the combination of select natural ingredients, premium oils, and our naturally-based preservative system. Manufactured in sunny Southern California, PURA D’OR is dedicated to providing sustainable and friendly products that use renewable energy. Advanced Therapy Conditioner The Power of 17 Key Active Ingredients Treat and Protect hair with PURA D’OR Advanced Therapy Conditioner! Clinically tested formula proven to reduce hair thinning due to breakage, increase volume, strength and shine. Our exclusive Aloe Vera base provides intense moisture and nourishment for healthy looking hair that feels great. Organic Argan Oil, Olive Oil, Pumpkin Seed Extract, and other premium ingredients enhance shine, promote manageability, and detangle hair.

Thousands of People Are Choosing PURA D'OR Over Other Brands To Promote Thicker Hair PURA D'OR Advanced Therapy Conditioner will turn your dry, damaged, distressed, frizzy, and thinning hair to a healthier, stronger, thicker hair. Here's Why... Less Hair In The Drain And On Your Brush With consistent use and the powerful blend of Key Active Ingredients, customers who switched to Advanced Therapy Conditioner experienced fuller, voluminous, and fuller hair with reduced breakage. Maintain the appearance of your hair by improving strength, volume, luster, and shine While other brands use synthetic, harsh ingredients, our Advanced Therapy Conditioner use a proprietary blend of botanical ingredients and Zinc Pyrithione to help soothe your scalp from any mild itching, irritation, flakes, dryness, breakage, and thinning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I have been looking for!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this conditioner. I have long hair, and I quit using shampoo long ago for the most part but maybe once a month to clean off the buildup. I have gotten tired of the chemical fake smells of products like Maui and some other brands have been searching for something more natural. So, I usually just wash my hair with conditioner but most brands build up. This conditioner does not! I've been using it for about 2 months now, once a week. I maintain my hair between washes with natural oils like coconut, olive and jojoba oils and a little rosemary essential oil mixed in. I have finally found this amazing stuff that is more natural than other products out there. Not sure I will get the shampoo but I may if I feel the conditioner starts to build up but so far I don't feel the need. This conditioner does everything I need it to. It cleans well and makes my hair soft, and the smell is pleasant. Not sure about the thinning stuff I'm not really thinning out much but can't hurt to prevent it. Pura D'or is definitely my new conditioner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This shampoo and conditioner
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo and conditioner works very well, I am very happy with the quality and everything about this product!

reviews.reviewText: El producto es bueno y tiene muy buen olor, deja suave el cabello pero se enreda un poco, en lo particular me gusta este producto.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Too oily, I prefer argan conditioner from PURA D'OR
reviews.reviewText: I have been using argan healing conditioner from PURA D'OR for some years, excellent!Tried this one, but too oily, will not buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hair loss reduction
reviews.reviewText: I had a subscription with biotin conditioner for hair loss, one bottle would come watered down, another bottle would come so thick condensed it would not pump out, my hair would stink on day 2, and more hair loss, so by accident I ran into this product, I have only used it twice and im impressed, day 1 same hair loss, day 2 very little, and as I brush my hair very little, so far I give this a 5 star, we will see , I started up a subscription to this conditioner I also use purador gold shampoo for hair loss, so this conditioner smells great, thickens hair , wish me luck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This conditioner, along with the shampoo works
reviews.reviewText: This along with the shampoo, I have seen less hair fallout.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purador hair conditioner.
reviews.reviewText: I have Been using this Hair Conditioner for awhile and like the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner smells a bit like almonds, better than the original that has a terrible smell! I have been using both the shampoo and the conditioner for about 4 weeks and have yet to notice any difference in my falling hair. Also, it tends to leave my hair dry. I'm not sure if it's the conditioner or the shampoo. I will continue to use what I bought but am not sure I will buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 28, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I rarely buy or use conditioner as I have a very sensitive scalp that gets easily itchy. This feels like a rich, nourishing product and I've had no reaction to it - so, a great find!
Hace poco que lo uso aún no puedo dar mi opinión
Excellent smell and consistentcy. Doesn't freeze in the shower!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Good product, makes my hair feel soft
